
## Compute Gaze Dispersion {.unnumbered}


### Description

Calculates centroid anddispersion from gaze data.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>gaze_dispersion(data, x, y, grouping_vars)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table role = "presentation">
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="data">data</code></td>
<td>
A data frame or tibble.
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="x">x</code></td>
<td>
A string: name of the column with X gaze coordinates.
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="y">y</code></td>
<td>
A string: name of the column with Y gaze coordinates.
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="grouping_vars">grouping_vars</code></td>
<td>
A character vector of column names to group by (e.g., subject, condition, trial).
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

A tibble with centroid_x, centroid_y, dispersion, and log_dispersion for each group.
